      • evaluate

        public double evaluate(int user)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Evaluates the Result of the Quiz taken by the User
        Parameters:
        user - the id of the user that took the quiz
        Returns:
        a percentage that represents the completion for the user in this quiz
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there was a problem with getting the required Data from the Database
